name: Dorky Fork
description:
Dorky Fork is an indie game in which you need to arrange cubes to complete levels.


Take a journey through more than 30 diverse and vibrant stages and then use ingame level editor to create your own puzzles.

Features

  • More than 30 levels
  • Dreamy soundtrack by there will be nø sadness
  • Colorful graphics
  • Ingame editor
